DESC.PARA: A cyclotron absorption line as used in pulsar spectra. See Mihara et al. Nature 1990 or Makishima et al. PASJ 1990.

PARA.EQUATION: M(E) = exp(-depth0 (width0 * E/e0)^2/[(E-e0)^2 + width0^2] + depth2(width2 E/(2 e0))^2/((E-2e0)^2 + width2^2))

DESC.PARA: This is a multiplicative model component.
This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.
